story.title: From Code Competitions to Enterprise Solutions
paragraphs: My journey started with competitive programming, where I became a 3-time national finalist in India's largest coding competition, ranking among the top 300 out of 250,000+ developers.

Over 8+ years, I've evolved from writing algorithms to architecting enterprise solutions that serve Fortune 500 companies. I've led technical teams, built products from inception to acquisition, and created systems that directly drive business revenue.
Today, I specialize in microservices architecture, AI integration, and blockchain solutions, helping companies scale their technology while building high-performing remote teams.
story.highlight: What drives me: Solving complex technical challenges that have measurable business impact, while mentoring teams and sharing knowledge through speaking and writing.

projects.title: Enterprise Cybersecurity Platform
projects.description: Single-handedly built backend serving 720+ CISOs across Fortune 500 companies, integrating AI for insights and automated reporting.
highlights: Built complete backend infrastructure serving Fortune 500 CISOs
Integrated OpenAI GPT for automated security insights

projects.title: AI Document Processing System
projects.description: Orchestrated 11 ML models to process 1,000+ documents/night with 99% accuracy. System success led to formation of new company.
highlights: Orchestrated 11 different ML models in production pipeline
Achieved 99% accuracy in document classification and extraction
Processed 1,000+ documents nightly without manual intervention
Success led to spin-off company formation

projects.title: Code Generation Framework
projects.description: Created framework automating 75% of application development, enabling migration of 150+ legacy systems across 15+ teams.
highlights: Automated 75% of standard application development workflows
Enabled migration of 150+ legacy applications to modern stack
Adopted by 15+ development teams across the organization
Reduced development time by 60% for standard enterprise applications
